description: Features for integrating all ACD projects via shared infrastructure, APIs, and data flows

categories.shared-auth: Portal28 shared authentication across all products
categories.shared-db: Supabase shared tables and RLS policies
categories.remotion-clients: Client SDKs for consuming Remotion API
categories.meta-hub: WaitlistLab as Meta API hub for all products
categories.monitoring: Observability, logging, alerting across all systems
categories.resilience: Error handling, retries, circuit breakers, queues
categories.ai-orchestration: AI model routing, prompt management, cost tracking
categories.feature-flags: Feature toggles, A/B testing, gradual rollouts

acceptance_criteria: Single Supabase project for all apps
User can have different roles per product
Admin in one, viewer in another
Profile updates propagate to all products
Each product only sees its own data

features.description: PCT Remotion integration for static ads
PCT Remotion integration for mini-VSL videos
WaitlistLab Remotion integration for ad creatives

acceptance_criteria: Submit multiple jobs in one call

features.description: WaitlistLab Meta Marketing API client library
PCT Meta API integration via WaitlistLab

acceptance_criteria: Link Remotion asset_id to Meta ad_id

features.description: API key management for external consumers
Shared Stripe customer ID across products

acceptance_criteria: Each product has own subscription products

features.description: PCT uses WaitlistLab for campaign creation
PCT uses WaitlistLab for ad creation
MediaPoster receives content from Content Factory
PCT voice reference for video ads
Content Factory voice cloning for scripts
GapRadar feeds niche data to Content Factory
GapRadar feeds competitor ads to PCT

acceptance_criteria: User opts out of one, affects all

features.description: EverReach mobile app Meta SDK integration
EverReach shares lead data with WaitlistLab

acceptance_criteria: Payment methods shared with other products

features.description: SoftwareHub license activation via Portal28 auth
BlogCanvas uses shared auth for vendors

acceptance_criteria: All products send logs to central system
All API keys in central vault

features.description: JWT token rotation for cross-product auth
API request signing for inter-service calls
Content Security Policy for all products
Meta API retry with exponential backoff
Dead letter queue for failed jobs

acceptance_criteria: Fallback from Nano Banana to DALL-E

features.description: TikTok API fallback to manual posting
TypeScript types package for shared schemas
Integration test suite for cross-product flows

acceptance_criteria: GPT-4 for complex, Haiku for simple

Meta webhook hub for ad events
API response caching for read endpoints
Demo data seeding for new users

acceptance_criteria: Custom audiences accessible to all products
